settings.title: Settings
settings.body: This data is encrypted, you need to input the password to get access
settings.relaunch: App needs to relaunch for this change to take effect

welcome.welcomeParagraph: All the incredible features introduced with Beaver Notes packed into the perfect note-taking app.
welcome.welcomeWarning: Beaver Pocket is currently in its alpha phase, which may cause issues. It is recommended to regularly back up your data. Please be aware that data loss is a possibility.
welcome.languageText: Choose the language you prefer. You can always go back and change this choice in the settings later.
welcome.themeText: Choose the look that best suits your style. Rest assured, you can always reconsider and make changes in the settings later.
welcome.typographyText: Personalize your experience with fonts that reflect your style. You can always change your mind and modify this choice in the settings later.
welcome.importText: Effortlessly bring in your notes taken on Beaver Notes. If you don't use the desktop app or are not ready to import your notes now? No problem, you can import them anytime in the settings.

home.messagePt1: It's a little empty in here. Click
home.messagePt2: to add a new note or click
home.title: New Note
home.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this note?
home.exportSuccess: Export completed successfully! Check your downloads.
home.exportError: The following error accured while exporting data and images:
home.shareError: The following error accured while trying to share your notes:
home.importError: An error accured while importing data. Please try again.
home.subtitle: Use biometrics to lock or unlock the note.
home.subtitle2: Use biometrics to unlock the note.
home.biometricFace: Use your Face ID for authentication
home.biometricTouch: Use your Touch ID for authentication
home.biometricError: Something went wrong. Please try again.
home.biometricPassword: Set up a password to lock/unlock your notes:
home.biometricUnlock: Enter the password to unlock the note:
